text:
To all Perth cricketers, this message is for you:

"Don't forget your ODD SOCKS this weekend and don't forget to get any odd lumps, bumps, aches or pains checked by a GP - it may save your life."

#cricket #sarcoma #cancer #charity #perth #perthisok #sport #cricketcares https://t.co/b5Y02ciuFj
